rows.label: qst711401_msg0002
rows.name:
Here in Gula and Iira, there are
machine parts that have accidentally
washed ashore from the Cloud Sea.

rows.label: qst711401_msg0003
rows.name:
I'm an adventurer who travels
all over Alst looking for
such machine parts.

rows.label: qst711401_msg0004
rows.name:
But, to the untrained eye, it's hard
to distinguish them from scrap.

rows.label: qst711401_msg0005
rows.name:
To collect the parts, you need a tool
called a "Seeker Machine," made by
someone with knowledge of machines.

rows.label: qst711401_msg0006
rows.name:
But the Seeker Machine
I have is broken.

rows.label: qst711401_msg0007
rows.name:
I was planning to use it to procure
a lot of machine parts all over Gula,
but my plans have been ruined.

rows.label: qst711401_msg0008
rows.name:
...No, wait. If I'm just going
to wait here, then maybe...

rows.label: qst711401_msg0009
rows.name:
Could you all collect the
machine parts for me?

rows.label: qst711401_msg0010
rows.name:
Forgive my bluntness, but you're all
a Driver and his Blades, right?

rows.label: qst711401_msg0011
rows.name:
For you all, exploring places
where monsters live must be
a piece of cake, right?

rows.label: qst711401_msg0012
rows.name:
Oh? You don't seem to mind.
Alright, it's decided!

rows.label: qst711401_msg0013
rows.name:
Well then, first, I'd like you to
build a Seeker Machine - Silver.

rows.label: qst711401_msg0014
rows.name:
With this, you should be able to
collect useful parts from the
machine parts scattered around.

rows.label: qst711401_msg0015
rows.name:
The Krabble Carapace needed to make the
Seeker Machine - Silver can be found at the
Serene Springside, so please look there.

rows.label: qst711401_msg0016
rows.name:
Once that's done, the next step is
to search for and collect the machine
parts that have washed ashore.

rows.label: qst711401_msg0017
rows.name:
Right now, I'm collecting one
part called a Bat Hinge and
one called a Scarlet Coil.

rows.label: qst711401_msg0018
rows.name:
These are often found in the
"silver machine parts" around
Gula, so please look for them.

rows.label: qst711401_msg0019
rows.name:
Well then, I'll be waiting
with anticipation!
